Line7.371E1: Today, Master Elias called at my door. I had trouble with my words, so I showed him my carvings. He said he could see my pain in them. The pain of a lonely man who had learned to hate the world, and yet...
Line9.371E1: Our Mother, Lilith, found me beautiful. He said there are others like me as well, and together, we will build the new world.
VoiceDir7.371E1: Hopeful. Emotional - Elias saw his suffering and gave him hope.
